statements: SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, affected_systems FROM security_incidents WHERE affected_systems > 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, reporting_user FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incidents WHERE affected_systems >= 5 ORDER BY incident_id ASC
SELECT reporting_user, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM security_incidents GROUP BY reporting_user HAVING num_incidents > 1
SELECT incident_type, affected_systems, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_description LIKE '%malware%' ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Cyberattack';
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_type = 'Incident Report' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT incident_description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_date, incident_description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_content FROM Reports WHERE report_type = 'Phishing Attack' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM security_reports WHERE report_type = 'Incident Report';
SELECT report_type, generated_date FROM security_reports ORDER BY generated_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT query_id, query_text, query_date FROM data_queries WHERE query_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY query_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type='Data Breach';
SELECT id, incident_date, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_type, description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_reports WHERE generated_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT report_type, details FROM security_reports ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Theft';
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_location = 'New York';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type, department_name FROM incidents JOIN departments ON incidents.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT users.username, departments.department_name FROM users JOIN departments ON users.department_id = departments.department_id ORDER BY departments.department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, incident_type, description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Hacking';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE reporter = 'Alice' AND report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.reporter, d.detail_text FROM IncidentReports r JOIN IncidentDetails d ON r.incident_id = d.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_date = '2023-10-15';
SELECT r.reporter, r.description, d.detail_text FROM IncidentReports r JOIN IncidentDetails d ON r.incident_id = d.incident_id;
SELECT q.executed_by, q.query_text, r.result_text FROM DataQueries q JOIN ReportResults r ON q.query_id = r.query_id ORDER BY r.result_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE reporter = 'John Doe' AND description LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
